metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7557 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
dnsdist version 1.1.0 is vulnerable to a flaw in authentication mechanism for REST API potentially allowing CSRF attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-7557` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dnsdist - 1.2.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dnsdist package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.0-1').
